bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of zheng 癥 , concretion-illness, which form when one consumes raw rice that accumulates without being digested. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 19: 米癥候 , 人有好啞米， 轉久彌嗜啞之…米不消化，遂生癥結 , “The signs of rice concretion-illness : When someone likes to eat rice, and when he has eaten long enough he eats it again ... The rice is undigested and forms concretion-illness nodes over time”. Mian gan 面䵟 , facial gloom [32]

Alternative Names mian gan 面皯 ; hei gan 黑䵟 , gloom; mian shang hei qi 面上黑氣 , dark qi covering the face; Abbreviated Designation gan 䵟 , gloom. Pathological Condition with a haggard, gloomy, and dark facial complexion as a major sign. Shen nong ben cao jing 神農本草經 Substance Entry tu si zi 菟絲子:汁去面䵟 , ”Its juice removes facial gloom ”.
